# Edit and run a report with data warehouse

Learn how to edit and run a report with data warehouse

To edit a report and run it with data warehouse, perform this procedure.

1.  In the left navigation section, navigate to Reporting > Reporting.
2.  Click the folder that contains the report you want to update. For more information about folders in reporting, see [Folders and sharing](/zuora-platform/data/reporting/use-reporting/folders-and-sharing).
3.  Click the triangle icon ![triangle-white.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/e6353483-28dc-4e1c-a4c1-462b346347fb?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..iiMKxs9dXlHW1iDSLnrwS_I0ODc9o_GkgVXr4mLKvc8) to the right of the report you want to edit. The drop-down list opens.
4.  From the drop-down list, click Edit.
5.  Update the report configuration as needed.
6.  Click the triangle icon ![triangle-blue.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/2b396e1c-cd33-41f4-be61-6fcbda354c9b?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..lC-Ov3dvWm-d4zDTGVepzTMauIk99SntCI5pfXxWv74) to the right of Run Report to open the drop-down list.
7.  From the drop-down list, select the option for the data warehouse you want to run this report with. For example, if you want to run the report with Zuora Warehouse \*, select Run Report with Warehouse.
